block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Wolcott 3d of Locust Valley, L.I., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Natalie Wolcott, to Hugo Andrew Younger Williams, a son of Mr. and Mrs. David M. Y. Williams of London. A July wedding is planned.

Miss Wolcott, 29, is the supervisor of the consignor-account department at Sotheby's in London. She graduated cum laude from Harvard University. Her father is a managing director of investment banking at Dean Witter, Discover & Company in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Wolcott 3d of Locust Valley, L.I., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Natalie Wolcott, to Hugo Andrew Younger Williams, a son of Mr. and Mrs. David M. Y. Williams of London. A July wedding is planned.

Miss Wolcott, 29, is the supervisor of the consignor-account department at Sotheby's in London. She graduated cum laude from Harvard University. Her father is a managing director of investment banking at Dean Witter, Discover & Company in New York.

Mr. Williams, 28, is the sales director at Woodstock Ltd., designers and manufacturers of custom interiors in London. He graduated with honors from the Courtauld Institute of Art in London. His father is the manager of the Russian and Central European division of Multitone Electronics P.L.C., a manufacturer and supplier of radio paging equipment in London.
